name: ObjectStyle
tagline: Stay relevant. With the right software
description:
ObjectStyle has been providing custom software solutions of great quality at a good price since 2002.
ObjectStyle was founded in the United States and currently has offices in Bridgeport, Connecticut (Sales, Consulting, and Support), Minsk, Belarus (Development and QA), and Warsaw, Poland (Sales and Development).
Among ObjectStyle clients are both large enterprises and smaller businesses. We have a proven delivery record of custom-made, personalized solutions that move your business forward.
WHY OBJECTSTYLE?
We are the opposite of a large, faceless corporation. As our client, you get all the attention you need.
When crafting your solution, we look at the big picture to see how the solution fits in your larger environment and how it can enhance other parts of your business.
SOLUTIONS
Software architecture design
Machine learning
E-commerce and enterprise search
Legacy platform redesign
DevOps and continuous delivery 
Security and access management
QA and testing
